snippet: A defense lawyer in Bahrain said two police officers were sentenced to 10 years in prison for the fatal beating of an antigovernment protester in 2011.
abstract: Two police officers are sentenced in Bahrain to 10 years in prison for fatal beating of antigovernment protester at beginning of country’s political crisis in 2011; sentences are among harshest against security forces for abuses in Bahrain’s unrest.
lead_paragraph: A defense lawyer in Bahrain said two police officers were sentenced to 10 years in prison for the fatal beating of an antigovernment protester in 2011.

headline.main: Bahrain: 2 Officers Are Sentenced for Torturing a Protester to Death
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: 2 Officers Are Sentenced For Torturing a Protester to Death

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
